page.title: 20The surveyors of this area
page.content: We thought that it would be rather nice to include as our last page some information about ourselves and how we did this survey. We will have left our school by the time you read this,and our school is due to closed and moved to a new site in September 1986.we really enjoyed taking part in the survey;which we did by splitting into 12 small groups and each group having parents to help them.We made plenty of phone calls,and then visits to find out those things which we have told you. We hope that as the years pass you will wonder a little about us,as we have wondered about who will read this,and for how long it will be seen by people in the future.We enjoy living in our area,and hope you will too if you ever visit. {Class 1 Mayflower C.Primary School
